Title: War Hydra
Legend: Stoked into a killing rage by the goads and lashing whips of their handlers, War Hydras lumber forward into battle, their multiple heads spitting flesh-melting gouts of flame as they stomp and crush the enemy to bloody paste.
Intro: Sever One Head, Another Takes Its

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: This unitâ€™s handlers are armed with Cruel Goads and Whips.

Rules.Name: Fiery Breath
Rules.Fluff: Each of the Hydra's many heads lets loose a torrent of flames that engulf the enemy.
Rules.Rule: The Attacks characteristic of Fiery Breath is equal to the number of models in the target unit, to a maximum Attacks characteristic of 10.

Rules.Name: Sever One Head, Another Takes Its Place
Rules.Fluff: It is almost impossible to kill a Hydra, for they regenerate wounds and regrow severed heads with alarming speed.
Rules.Rule: At the end of the combat phase, you can heal up to 5 wounds allocated to this model.
